title: Kicking plastic out of sport - Webinar

content.text: As part of the Interreg funded Preventing Plastic Pollution project the Environment Agency’s Plastics and Sustainability team are working to reduce the amount of avoidable plastic used by sports events, clubs, participants and venues.
Webinar attendees from the South Coast (Cornwall to Norfolk) will be offered the opportunity to trial equipment to help them reduce avoidable plastic when training and taking part in events.
